channel.title: Supporting donor partners based in Africa/Asia etc to publish to IATI
channel.description: We're currently scoping a project with others, which will look at challenges, opportunities and support needs of donor's partners publishing to IATI who are based in Africa and Asia and elsewhere, such as CSOs and academic institutions.If you are working on something similar and interested in sharing information or potentially collaborating, please contact me directly at sjohns [at] bond [dot] org [dot] uk cc @JohnAdams @YohannaLoucheur

item.title: Supporting donor partners based in Africa/Asia etc to publish to IATI
item.dc:creator: SJohns
item.description:
We’re currently scoping a project with others, which will look at challenges, opportunities and support needs of donor’s partners publishing to IATI who are based in Africa and Asia and elsewhere, such as CSOs and academic institutions.If you are working on something similar and interested in sharing information or potentially collaborating, please contact me directly at sjohns [at] bond [dot] org [dot] uk
cc @JohnAdams @YohannaLoucheur

Read full topic
item.source: Supporting donor partners based in Africa/Asia etc to publish to IATI
